documents.document: @pjveal @TuataraBrew Looks like I'll have to add that to the 'summer' playlist...

@pjveal tragic news - condolences to family and the Rangatira team

@roddrury @FlyAirNZ +1. I live in hope that I've finally won something in one of their competitions

@kenlaban SCOBs looking strong!
About to make our first @movac_vc #fund4 investment. Excited to be putting a some of our $105m raised to work. Still open for new investors

@ohopedude @ClaudiaBatten @francesvnz one of the highlights of @youngentnz 2016. Ambition delivering results. NZ needs more coders!
@youngentnz @GovGeneralNZ terrific execution created an outstanding result. Full credit.
@youngentnz A grade branding and packaging. Competitor products should be worried.
@youngentnz expanded their product line with an ice cream that customers lapped up. Literally.
@youngentnz @RachelTaulelei very well deserved. A credit to his family and community. Bright future ahead.
@BillEnglishMP in full flight at @youngentnz awards. Outstanding speech - engaging and aspirational #getsmyvote https://t.co/u8NbRlUpCG
@youngentnz @RachelTaulelei Thanks again for the opportunity. Loved it. Tough to pick the winner, but got there eventually. V well deserved

Since we formally launched @movac_vc #fund4 last month at $105m in commitments, we've had strong investor interest. Get in touch for details

well done @techlawnz @simmondsnz for #founderconnz. Reverberations in the market are glowingly positive.
@StuTasmantuna #cowexit

Increased investor uptake as we head to 1st close of @movac_vc #fund4, which will be committing $2-15m per company over next couple of years
Want to build a career working with some of NZ's most dynamic tech companies? @movac_vc is hiring - https://t.co/lEWg2ACAXk
We're hiring at @movac_vc . Great chance to start/progress your career in NZ early stage growth capital investment. https://t.co/MZ8hccd5QR
@movac_vc #fund4 first close is imminent. Humbled by the quality of our investors. Most importantly, deal flow is outstanding.
Looking for a skilled calligrapher for a small task here in Wellington. Any suggestions? Thanks in advance
